history.proof: intros. qsimpl use: locally_open. intros y HyD. qsimpl use: locally_open. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros T D E HDE HDEx HOxD x HxD.
intros T' D E HDE HDEx HOxD x HxD.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : UniformSpace D, E : T -> Prop H : forall x : T, D x <-> E x H0 : open D Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball ?M2439 eps y -> ?M2436 y" with "forall x : T, E x -> locally x E".
The reference HDE was not found in the current environment.
The reference HDEx was not found in the current environment.

In environment T : UniformSpace H1 : forall D E : T -> Prop, open D -> (forall x : T, D x -> E x) -> forall x : T, D x -> locally x E D, E : T -> Prop H0 : open D H : forall x : T, E x -> D x H2 : forall x : T, D x -> E x y : T HyD : E y Unable to unify "E y" with "locally y E".

original: intros T D E HDE HDEx HOxD x HxD. apply locally_open with (D := D); auto. intros y HyD. apply HDE, HxD. apply HDEx. apply HyD.
